common_2140_announce_01:
There’s one last match in this tournament, ladies
and gentlemen...\c
Allow me to introduce the two Trainers who’ll
be facing off to finally determine who’s strongest\r
in the academy!
common_2140_announce_03:
a special guest joining our tournament, the Top
Champion, Geeta!
common_2140_top_02: I had a feeling I would meet you in the finals.[npcn:11]

makes their hearts race.[npcn:11]
common_2140_top_05:

ideal world.[npcn:11]
common_2140_top_06:
As the chairperson for both the Pokémon League
and the academy...[npcn:11]
common_2140_top_07: I find this situation to be incredibly satisfying.[npcn:11]
common_2140_top_08:
Now, if we both push each other to greater
heights, we will achieve greater synergy.[npcn:11]
